string.value: There is a rumor around town that Cassandra has been collecting Owl Tail Feathers as part of her secret part-time job. Wait, but if it's a secret...

An Owl Tail Feather that came from a sealed box. Is this what Cassandra has been looking for? Go see Cassandra. 


#i2430052:# #t2430052:# #c2430052# / 5
You brought the Owl Tail Feather. Since you've completed the secret part-time job, I'll let you perform a secret trade with the great Cassandra.
Sshh! You there! Are you interested in a part-time job? It's really quite simple. What do you think?

Okay, great! Well, have you ever seen an owl's tail feather? Sshh! It's a secret, but I've been collecting them on behalf of Lady Syl. Unfortunately, I'm a few short of what she has requested. Could you bring me #r5 Owl Tail Feathers#k? Oh, here's a tip: the Owl Tail Feathers are contained inside #rSeal Boxes#k.
I guess you must be busy. Fine, but just don't tell anyone that I'm collecting feathers. Sshh!
You haven't collected #r5 Owl Tail Feathers#k yet. You haven't forgotten about my request, have you?
